faqs.question: How do I restore my Lace wallet?
faqs.answer: Use your recovery phrase in Lace. Ensure all words are typed correctly and in the right order.

faqs.question: Does Daedalus support message signing?
faqs.answer: Currently, Daedalus does not support message signing. Please use Lace for this feature.

faqs.question: How can I check my staking rewards?
faqs.answer: You can view your staking rewards directly in Lace under the Staking tab, or by using a Cardano blockchain explorer.

faqs.question: How do I restore a Daedalus paper wallet?
faqs.answer: In Daedalus, go to 'Add wallet' > 'Restore wallet' > 'Daedalus wallet' and select '27-word paper wallet'.

faqs.question: Can I use Ledger with Lace?
faqs.answer: Yes. Lace supports Ledger hardware wallets. Connect your device and select 'Hardware Wallet' when adding an account.

faqs.question: Why is my balance showing 0 after restoring?
faqs.answer: Check that your recovery phrase is entered correctly and that you are on the correct network (Mainnet vs Testnet).

faqs.question: Does Lace support multi-delegation?
faqs.answer: Yes. Lace allows you to delegate to multiple stake pools at once.

faqs.question: What should I do if I lose my recovery phrase?
faqs.answer: Without the recovery phrase you cannot restore your wallet. If possible, move any funds to a new wallet with a safe backup.

faqs.question: How can I update Lace to the latest version?
faqs.answer: Visit https://www.lace.io/ and download the latest version, or update via your browser's extension store.

faqs.question: Is Lace mobile available?
faqs.answer: Lace mobile is under development and will include send, receive, and staking features. See the roadmap at https://www.lace.io/roadmap-2025.pdf.

faqs.question: How long until I see staking rewards after delegating?
faqs.answer: Rewards begin about 2 epochs after you delegate (≈10 days). You'll then receive rewards every epoch while you stay delegated.

faqs.question: Can I change stake pools any time?
faqs.answer: Yes. Delegation is not locked. Switching pools is immediate, but rewards from the new pool start about 2 epochs later.

faqs.question: Why does my wallet show a new receive address each time?
faqs.answer: For privacy, HD wallets generate fresh addresses automatically. All addresses belong to the same wallet; your total balance is combined.

faqs.question: What's the minimum ADA needed when holding/sending native tokens?
faqs.answer: Cardano requires a small ADA amount (min-UTxO) with each output that holds tokens. Lace calculates this automatically when you send.

faqs.question: My transaction is pending for a long time—what can I do?
faqs.answer: Ensure your wallet is fully synced and online. Network load and transaction size affect confirmation time. If it still hangs, try again later with a simpler output set.

faqs.question: What's the difference between Mainnet and Testnet?
faqs.answer: Mainnet is the live network with real ADA. Testnets are for testing only and use test ADA. Always confirm you're on Mainnet before sending funds.

faqs.question: Can I send multiple tokens in one transaction?
faqs.answer: Yes. Cardano UTxO supports multiple assets per transaction. Make sure there is enough ADA to satisfy the min-UTxO for each output.

faqs.question: Hardware wallet is not detected in Lace—any tips?
faqs.answer: Unlock your device, open the Cardano app on it, connect via USB, and approve any prompts in the browser. Try a different cable/USB port if needed.

faqs.question: Daedalus is stuck syncing. How can I fix it?
faqs.answer: Daedalus is a full node and initial sync can take many hours. Check disk space, internet stability, and system time. Restart the app; if needed, review logs or reinstall.

faqs.question: How are Cardano transaction fees determined?
faqs.answer: Fees are based on transaction size and protocol parameters. Wallets set fees automatically; unusually large transactions (many assets/outputs) cost more.

faqs.question: How do I connect Lace to a dApp?
faqs.answer: Open the dApp in your browser and click 'Connect Wallet'. Choose Lace from the list. Approve the connection in the Lace pop-up.

faqs.question: Why is the dApp connection failing?
faqs.answer: Make sure Lace is unlocked, your browser allows pop-ups, and you are on the correct network (Mainnet vs Testnet). Some dApps only support specific networks.

faqs.question: How do I revoke a dApp connection in Lace?
faqs.answer: In Lace, go to 'Settings' → 'Connected dApps'. From there you can remove any dApp you no longer want linked to your wallet.

faqs.question: Can I recover my wallet if I only have the address?
faqs.answer: No. A Cardano wallet can only be recovered with the recovery phrase (seed). Addresses alone are not enough.

faqs.question: How do I restore a wallet in Lace?
faqs.answer: On the start screen, choose 'Restore Wallet', then enter your 12-, 15-, 24- or 27-word recovery phrase, depending on the wallet type.

faqs.question: What should I do if I typed my recovery phrase incorrectly?
faqs.answer: Ensure correct spelling and order of all words. If even one word is wrong, the wallet cannot be restored. Double-check against the official BIP39 word list.
